attributes.action: Stop our trampoline being taken from our autistic children by the council
attributes.additional_details:
Our children have nowhere to play other than in our communal garden as there are to many cars up and down the road this is our children’s safe place to play without being injured by a vehicle 
Save our children’s trampoline
attributes.background: Stop our kids trampoline being taken by Birmingham city council

rejection.details:
This is a matter for your local authority. 

You can find details of your local councillor here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors/birmingham

You can set up a local petition with Birmingham City Council here: https://www.birmingham.gov.uk/info/20146/consultation_and_engagement/702/petitions
